tagline: Your trusted local business offering quality products and services with exceptional customer care.
about_text: At Baraka, we are committed to providing our customers with the highest quality products and exceptional service. Located in the heart of Castel San Giovanni, we have been serving our community for years with dedication and care. Our team takes pride in offering personalized service and ensuring every customer leaves satisfied.
quality_text: We carefully select each product to ensure the highest standards.
service_text: Our team is dedicated to providing personalized attention.
care_text: Your satisfaction is our top priority.

privacy_who_we_are_text: We are [Legal Company Name] ("we", "us", "our"), registered at [Full Address], company/tax number [Number if applicable]. You can contact us at [privacy email] or [phone], or by post to the address above. If appointed, our Data Protection Officer (DPO) can be reached at [DPO email]. privacy_what_policy_covers_text: This policy explains how we collect, use, share, store, secure, and delete your personal data when you visit, register, or use [Service Name] (the "Service"), and describes your rights under the GDPR.
privacy_data_we_collect_list: Identification and contact data: first name, last name, email, phone.
Account data: password (stored hashed), language preferences, account settings.
Demographic and profile data: date of birth, residence, country of origin.
Technical data: IP address, device identifiers, browser type, pages viewed, and timestamps.
Cookies/SDK data: necessary and, with consent, analytics/marketing cookies. See "Cookies and similar technologies."
Optional data you provide to support, surveys, or feature requests.
privacy_data_we_collect_text: Do not provide special categories of data (e.g., health, biometric, political opinions) unless specifically requested and lawfully justified; otherwise we will not knowingly process them.
privacy_why_we_process_data_text: We process personal data only where a valid legal basis applies:
privacy_why_we_process_data_list: Account creation and administration: to register you, authenticate you, and provide the Service (contract).
Service operation and security: to operate, maintain, troubleshoot, prevent fraud/abuse (legitimate interests; where needed, legal obligation).
Communications: service emails about changes, security, or account notices (contract/legal obligation); optional marketing with your consent and an opt‑out.
Analytics and improvement: to understand usage, improve performance and features (legitimate interests; analytics cookies only with consent).
Compliance: to meet legal obligations (tax, accounting, regulatory requests), enforce terms, protect rights.
privacy_why_we_process_data_text2: Where we rely on legitimate interests, we balance our interests against your rights and freedoms and can provide details upon request. You may object to processing based on legitimate interests.
privacy_when_you_must_provide_data_text: Where data are necessary to create an account or provide the Service, failure to provide them may prevent registration or access. Mandatory fields are marked at registration.
privacy_who_receives_your_data_text: We share data only as needed:
privacy_who_receives_your_data_list: Service providers (processors): hosting, analytics, customer support, communications, payments. They act on our instructions and under data protection agreements.
Legal and compliance: authorities or third parties when required by law or to protect rights and safety.
Business transfers: in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, subject to safeguards and notice.
privacy_who_receives_your_data_text2: We do not sell your personal data.
privacy_international_data_transfers_tex: If we transfer your data outside the EEA/UK, we use approved safeguards such as European Commission adequacy decisions or Standard Contractual Clauses, and, where needed, supplementary measures. You can request a copy of relevant safeguards.
privacy_data_retention_title: How Long We Keep Your Data
privacy_data_retention_text: We keep personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes in this policy:
privacy_data_retention_list: Account data: for the life of your account and a reasonable period thereafter for record‑keeping, security, and legal obligations.
Transactional/technical logs: for shorter periods aligned with security and audit needs.
privacy_data_retention_text2: We apply criteria such as legal limitation periods, regulatory requirements, and operational needs. When no longer needed, we delete or irreversibly anonymize data.
privacy_privacy_rights_list: Right of access: get a copy of your personal data.
Right to rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
Right to erasure: request deletion in certain cases (e.g., consent withdrawal, no longer needed).
Right to restriction: limit processing in specific circumstances.
Right to portability: receive your data in a machine‑readable format and have it transmitted to another controller where technically feasible.
Right to object: object to processing based on legitimate interests or direct marketing.
Rights related to automated decision‑making: request human review and contest decisions where applicable.
privacy_privacy_rights_text2: To exercise these rights, contact us at [privacy email]. We may need to verify your identity. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local supervisory authority.
privacy_consent_withdrawal_text: Where processing relies on your consent (e.g., marketing or non‑essential cookies), you may withdraw consent at any time via account settings, cookie banner, unsubscribe links, or by contacting us, without affecting processing before withdrawal.
privacy_cookies_list: Strictly necessary cookies: required for login, security, and core functions (no consent needed).
With your consent: analytics and, if used, marketing cookies. You can manage preferences in the cookie banner or browser settings at any time.
privacy_cookies_text2: See our Cookie Policy for details on categories, purposes, lifetimes, and providers.
privacy_children_data_text: Our Service is not directed to children under the age required by local law. If we learn we processed a child's data without appropriate consent, we will delete it. Additional parental consent obligations apply for children's consent in some jurisdictions.
privacy_security_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data, including encryption in transit, access controls, secure development practices, and vendor due diligence. No system is 100% secure; we maintain and improve safeguards over time.
privacy_automated_decision_making_text: We do not use automated decision-making that produces legal or similarly significant effects without appropriate safeguards. If we introduce such processing, we will provide required notices and enable your rights.
privacy_third_party_sites_text: The Service may link to third-party websites or services. Their privacy practices are governed by their own policies; review them before providing data.
privacy_changes_to_policy_text: We may update this policy to reflect changes in law, technology, or our practices. We will update the "Last updated" date and, where required, provide prominent notice or request renewed consent.
privacy_contact_complaints_text: Questions or requests: [privacy email], [postal address], [phone]. You have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection authority, such as the authority in your habitual residence, place of work, or place of the alleged infringement.
cookies_placeholder: This is a placeholder for the Cookie Policy.

You agree to provide accurate, complete information and to keep your login credentials confidential. You are responsible for all activity under your account and must promptly notify us of any suspected unauthorized use or security breach. terms_shipping_returns_list: Shipping: regions served, delivery estimates, and costs.

terms_shipping_returns_text2: Mandatory consumer rights apply and prevail over conflicting terms.
terms_consumer_rights_text: For distance contracts with EU consumers, you may have a 14‑day right of withdrawal under national laws implementing EU rules, subject to legal exceptions (e.g., after starting delivery of digital content/services with your express consent and acknowledgment of losing the withdrawal right). how_to_use_description: A comprehensive guide to understanding and using the Baraka Customer Loyalty Platform for both administrators and customers
how_to_use_what_is_baraka_text: Baraka is a comprehensive customer loyalty platform designed for physical retail shops. It combines a public website, customer registration system, customer dashboard, admin dashboard, and a loyalty points system with WhatsApp Business API integration for messaging.
how_to_use_what_is_baraka_text2: Our platform helps businesses build stronger relationships with their customers through personalized loyalty programs, targeted communications, and seamless shopping experiences.
how_to_use_build_loyalty_text: Create a points-based rewards system that keeps customers coming back to your store.
how_to_use_increase_engagement_text: Send personalized offers and targeted communications to engage customers effectively.
how_to_use_manage_information_text: Easily manage customer information and track their interactions for better service.
how_to_use_for_business_owners_list: Wanting to gather customer data for marketing
Expanding to serve diverse linguistic communities
how_to_use_customer_registration_text: Customers register with personal information and consent to data processing
how_to_use_loyalty_points_text: Customers earn points based on purchases which can be redeemed for rewards
how_to_use_admin_management_text: Admins manage customers, offers, points, and send targeted communications
how_to_use_admin_dashboard_overview_text: The admin dashboard is the central hub for managing your customer loyalty program. As a store manager, you have access to all aspects of the platform including customer management, offer creation, points tracking, and communication tools.
All actions in the admin panel are secured with authentication and audit-logged to ensure data integrity and compliance with GDPR regulations.
how_to_use_customer_management_list: Filter by name, country of origin, or residence
how_to_use_offers_management_list: Target offers to specific customer groups
how_to_use_how_to_manage_customers_list: Navigate to the "Customers" section in the admin dashboard
View the complete list of registered customers with their details
Use filters to search for specific customers by name, country, or residence
Click on a customer to view their profile, points history, and purchase history
If necessary, add or deduct loyalty points to their account
how_to_use_adding_points_list: Go to the "Points" section in the admin dashboard
Enter the purchase amount (default formula: €1 = 1 point)
Points will be added to the customer's account immediately
how_to_use_converting_to_vouchers_list: Specify the point value to convert
System generates a unique voucher code
Share the voucher with the customer
Track voucher usage in the system
how_to_use_sending_whatsapp_messages_tex: The platform integrates with WhatsApp Business API to enable direct communication with customers.
how_to_use_sending_whatsapp_messages_lis: Navigate to the "Campaigns" section in the admin dashboard
Select the type of message (Promotional, Birthday, Nationality-targeted)
Choose the target customer group using filters
Customize the message content as needed
Send the message and monitor delivery status in the logs
how_to_use_sending_whatsapp_messages_tex: All messages must use pre-approved templates to comply with WhatsApp Business API policies.
how_to_use_getting_started_text: The Baraka customer loyalty platform is designed to be simple and intuitive for all users. Whether you're new to the platform or a returning customer, this guide will help you make the most of your loyalty rewards.
how_to_use_getting_started_text2: Our platform supports multiple languages (Italian, English, French, Spanish, and Arabic) to serve diverse communities. You can switch languages using the translator widget.
how_to_use_registration_steps_list: Check your email or WhatsApp for confirmation
Log in to your new account
how_to_use_using_your_dashboard_text: Once logged in, your customer dashboard becomes your central hub for managing your loyalty rewards.
how_to_use_how_points_work_text: Our loyalty program works on a simple principle: you earn points for every purchase you make, which can then be redeemed for valuable rewards.
how_to_use_how_points_work_list: Default rate: €1 spent = 1 loyalty point earned
Points are added to your account after purchases
Points are tracked automatically in your wallet
Points never expire as long as your account remains active
how_to_use_redeeming_points_text: When you have enough points, you can exchange them for vouchers to use at our store.
how_to_use_redeeming_points_list: Check your points balance in the dashboard
Contact our staff for point redemption
Admin converts points to unique voucher code
Use voucher code at checkout to get discount
how_to_use_updating_information_text: Keep your information up-to-date to receive personalized offers and communications.
how_to_use_communicating_with_us_text: We may send you personalized offers, birthday messages, or important updates via WhatsApp.
how_to_use_communicating_with_us_list: Ensure your phone number is current
Opt-out anytime if you don't wish to receive updates
how_to_use_faq1_q: How do I check my points balance?
how_to_use_faq1_a: Log in to your account and visit your dashboard to see your current points balance and history.
how_to_use_faq2_a: No, your points do not expire as long as your account remains active.
how_to_use_faq3_q: How do I redeem my points for rewards?
how_to_use_faq3_a: Contact our staff at the store, and they will help convert your points to a voucher code.
how_to_use_faq4_q: What if I forget my password?
how_to_use_faq4_a: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password via email.
